question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and turn left and move forward and go over the building and and turn left and little move forward and turn right and move forward and get down at intersection road and turn right at tree and fly up and move forward. now get down at intersection road and turn left and move forward and our back and fly up and move forward and go over the building and road. now get down front of the pink building and turn back and your see daves car wash building and fly up and move forward and go over the building. now move towards the american board of the building and turn left and fly up and move forward. now get down beside white building and move forward and go over the road and turn left and forward and turn right and move forward and landed at front of american board of the building.]. At the initial position, you are asked to navigate according to a series of movement instructions. When you reach the final position, what is your orientation to the building's US panels?  
choose:  
A. I am located to the left of the American Commission building.  
B. I am located above the American Commission building.  
C. I am far away from the building.  
D. I am located in front of the American Council building.  
E. I am located behind the American Council building.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: D; Reason: The final instruction directs the agent to land in front of the American Board of the building, which aligns with option D stating "I am located in front of the American Council building." The sequence of movements described in the instructions leads to this specific location.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0:31, 0:47)]
Option: D
Reason: The video shows the agent moving through the city, and the final frames (0:31-0:47) show the agent landing in front of a tall building. The building has a distinctive architectural style and is clearly visible. Therefore, the agent is located in front of the American Council building.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: D; Reason: The final instruction directs the agent to land in front of the American Board of the building, which aligns with option D stating "I am located in front of the American Council building." The sequence of movements described in the instructions leads to this specific location.
